name: Justin Ryan

last_movies.title: 名人厨艺大师 第六季

introduction: Colin Lewis McAllister and Justin Patrick Ryan are Scottish interior decorators and television presenters. McAllister and Ryan have incorporated their trademark behaviour (which includes honest opinion, fussiness and light-hearted put-downs) into most of their programmes.As well as being co-hosts, McAllister and Ryan have also been a couple since 1986 and are credited as introducing laminate flooring to British households. On 15 February 2008, they had a private civil partnership ceremony in London followed by a Caribbean honeymoon.Although their main residence is Glasgow, they divide their time between there and London in their own homes in both cities. The two also own a downtown loft in Toronto as well as a cottage in Central Ontario. They have filmed 4 × 13 episode series of Colin and Justin's Home Heist for HGTV, which is broadcast in approximately 25 countries.
